rules.name: Remove EAR and Oracle WebLogic specific files and directories
rules.description: This rule finds out ear modules as they are not required and compatible in Apache Tomcat server

rules.name: Remove WebLogic Quartz dependency
rules.description: Remove WebLogic specific quartz packages and add standard quatz package for Tomcat

rules.name: Remove WebLogic Coherence dependency
rules.description: Remove WebLogic specific oracle coherence packages and respective code blocks
